sentences.sContent: Beer and ale production uses cereal grains such as barley, wheat, and Rice.
sentences.sContent_eng: Beer and ale production uses cereal grains such as barley, wheat, and Rice.
sentences.sCn: 啤酒和麦啤酒的生产使用谷物，例如，大麦、小麦和大米。

sentences.sContent: At one time, though, especially in Europe, one of the classic smells of the Yuletide was Christmas ale.
sentences.sContent_eng: At one time, though, especially in Europe, one of the classic smells of the Yuletide was Christmas ale.
sentences.sCn: 不过曾有一个时期，尤其是在欧洲，圣诞季的经典气味之一当属圣诞节啤酒。

phrases.pCn: 姜味较淡的姜汁汽水；姜汁无酒精饮料

remMethod.val: 加上p就变成了pale， 可以记作“喝了淡色啤酒(ale)就脸色苍白(pale)”

trans.tranOther: a type of beer made from  malt 1
